name: WWF - GGJ2021
description:
~*NOTE: IF YOU PLAY IN BROWSER, FULL SCREEN MODE (AND THEN IF YOU WANT, UN-FULLSCREEN) TO VIEW PROPERLY*~

Fashion wrestlers duke it out by picking outfits and strutting their stuff for each other! The friendliest competitive dress up card game I've ever seen.  

- Choose from 4 characters
- 12 different clothes for a lot of combo varieties!
- Each article of clothing comes with its own special move to wow your opponent
- Trade clothes with your new wrestling friends!
- Learn tips from them and join their community of buff confidence-boosting fashionistas.
- Instead of taking down their health in competitions, you compete to raise your self confidence! The most confident wins!

Credits

Blake Tupman - Illustration, character design, and environment design
Mo Cohen - Code + unity wrangler
Alexandrite - Music
Quenten King - Animation
Seanna Musgrave - the backup dancing of programming

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021, in 72hrs.
